titles.title: A bill to provide for an extension of regional referral center classifications, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S444)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 1/21/1993--Introduced. Amends the Omnibus Budget Reconciliation Act of 1989 to extend the regional referral center classification of hospitals so classified as of September 30, 1989, under title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act, through FY 1994.
